评论详情: I received 4 compliments the first hour I wore them!! A style unusual for me and it worked. They will be my yoga pants. I liked: The style, the pattern, the loose but styled fit. I didn't like: the thin material, might not last, but will feel good on a hot day

This was the exact pair of pants I imagined they would be. There are many imitations (which I experienced first hand having lived in Thailand for almost 5 years) but/and these are authentically Thai and for me nostalgically so. The material is thin and loose making it breathable and comfortable. The solid black color goes with everything. While I don’t typically wear Rayon I could layer this multiple times making it a great value for the money.

评论概述: These are now my favorite pants!
评论详情: I love everything about these pants, from the low price, to the comfortable fit,to the fashionable look that can be dressed up or down. Buy them, you won't regret it.
lightweight, super comfortable, baggy & a dream to wear lounging around the house. now i need more colors!
These are beautiful and i love the flowyness of the pants. These would be perfect for yoga!
I am fond of these pants because they are light, comfortable, and stylish. I plan on purchasing more colors.
Material quality is soo soo good

These are the best "lounging around" pants I've ever owned. They're beautiful, soft, and they breathe. You can dress them up for going out or to the office, or dress down (think gym wear or pj pants). I wear a 12/14 in other sizes and purchased these in a medium. They fit really well. I'd love to purchase these in one of the other prints!

These pants are very comfy and airy. The fabric seems quality and is quite soft. I ordered my normal size and the fit was great. They look flattering and could be used for yoga, lounging, or as warm weather pants.

These high-waisted yoga pants are stylish and have a cute design, but they did not quite meet all my expectations. While the fabric is lightweight and comfortable, they were baggier than I anticipated, and the high waist did not stay in place as well as I hoped. I love that they have pockets, but they are huge and feel flimsy. I tried sticking my phone in one and was afraid it would fall out. They are also see-through, given the thin fabric. They are great for lounging around the house or doing laundry, but I would not feel confident wearing them for yoga or out and about. Overall, they are decent but not as versatile as I expected.
Material is good. Fit is good and they are comfortable.

OH gosh IT IS SO HARD to be a plus size Boho Hippie heart! All the cute stuff is constantly a let down. Even though most of it is one size fits "most". It's almost a guarantee I am not the "most" they refer to. I actually wear closer to a 2x/3x but I went for it with these in XL in hopes the stretch would cut it. And it does! And comfortably without highlighting the problem spots. Comfy material and a nice, crisp design, I can't wait to buy another pair!

These pants are ofcourse super comfortable but very long. Good for summers but need to layer up in winters. I like the design as well. Super cute. I wish there would be an option of short length as well.

评论概述: Cute but with a few issues
评论详情: First let me say that I love the look of these pants. They are suuuuper cute! They’re also incredibly comfy, and would work well on a wide variety of body types and sizes.  However there are a few things I dislike about them! The material is very very thin; for both the sake of warmth and modesty (I feel like in direct sun you’d see right thru them), I wear leggings under them. The material also wrinkles really easily. I took the time to iron them out, then took a 5 mile cat ride and by the time I arrived they were full of deep creases all over again. And worry that the unfinished edges on the inside of the pockets will fray.  I doubt these will hold up over the long term, which is disappointing because they definitely look great on me!
I ordered my normal size but wish the fit was a bit looser. A good value for the money.

Love this product its very light-weight, soft and perfect for summertime as its extremely thin making it airy and comfortable for those pesky heat waves you feel during summer, the best affordable boho pants ive gotten !!

I bought these to use as pajama pants and love them. The fabric is super soft and almost silky. They are very slightly see through when held up to the light, but it is not really noticeable when wearing them. Lightweight, breathable and cute!

I had never worn a style like these pants before, but as soon as I received them I was able to easily put together a really cute outfit for date night. They are flowing and not tight, gr8 for buffet outings!
I really like the design and how soft the pants are.  I'm also a fan of the pockets, however, I recommend ordering a size down as I got the medium and it was way too big. My mom likes them though.
I love the quality

I have always been curious about theese type of boho pants. I am upset I did not try some sooner and waited for review ones as theese are amazing and I am in love, I have even recieved compliments on them with friends asking for some for Christmas.  I need more in multiple colors. I would also say true to size fits well but you can also go down a size or two if you don't want them as baggy I am a 16-18w and went for the XL I think a Large or even Medium will still fit well giving the same desired look however if you don't have chicken legs like me I probably would not go two sizes down just one or stick with your true to size.
Just as described. Soft and flowy. Very comfortable. Love the pattern!

评论概述: I was skeptical that these would fit, but they are perfect
评论详情: I am comfortably a 16/18... leaning more toward an 18 after a big meal and these are great.  They fit really nicely and are just long enough on me at 5'7".  I love the solid black option so I can still wear comfy pants and look a little more put together.  I might have to buy the elephants next!
These pants are so cute! they blouse out like they are supposed to and are SO comfortable to wear. Looks great with a sweater. Very breezy and cute
These pants are too cute.  I love the pockets.  However they are sheer and thin.  Be prepared to wear leggings or tights underneath!
I find myself grabbing for these a lot. They're really comfy and are not see through at all.
They have a fishy smell? I got the plain black and they are quite thin and see through. But they fit nice

This is a great fit. The color is cute. That being said... it is SEE THROUGH. I wanted these to wear around the house. I can only do that when I have no intention of going outside or when my son is not at home 😀
These are great casual pants, super flowy and comfortable. The rayon fabric is beautiful, and the waist is super stretchy. Love!

评论概述: Very nice comfy pants and pockets too
评论详情: If you have never owned a pair of these type/pattern pants you should try them out. This brand Tranquil Threads makes a good pair of what I always called "Thai" pants. These pants are made in Thailand. The material is 100% rayon, it is soft, lightweight (not see through) and hangs nicely. Beautiful print too! There pants are cute on and go with a T-shirt, tank top really whatever you'd like to pair them with. The XL is an extra large lose fit. I wash on cold, gentle cycle in a net bag, then hang dry. Love them!

Best pants ever!! If I could only wear one pair of pants for the rest of my life these would be them. These pants are so comfortable it feels like you're not wearing ANYTHING. I accidentally left my house not wearing any pants because I thought I was wearing them! Oops!! Buy them you wont regret it.

These are airy comfy and cute. The fabric is thin but, it feels like good quality. I haven’t washed them yet but, they seem pretty solid. The fit is true to size. We shall see. Right now i am thinking i might need another pair or two.
These pants are so cute and comfy. I love them!

I”d never seen yoga pants quite like these before and I was immediately attracted to the colors and patterns.  So I got a pair of harem pants.  Harem refers to long, thin flowy pants cinched tight at the ankles, and, in this case, cinched in at the waist with  a band of elastic.  Apparently, the style originated  in Thailand.It is wonderful that these pants can be worn to any occasion and look elegant with either a blouse or a tank top. I wouldn’t recommend them for deep winter, but for now they have become part of my favorite indoor lounge suit.What I liked best about these pants was the loose, flowing fabric. The cut and fabric  make for a barely-there feeling while allowing great freedom of movement. They are true to size.
Fits perfectly and are so comfortable! Easily my new favorite pants.

I feel like these run true to size, with a bit of wiggle room.  I would size up if between sizes.  The fabric has zero stretch, except in the ankle and waist, where it has elastic with gathers to expand.  The legs and seat have no stretch.  I'm a size 12/14 and I ordered XL.  In the past, I've ordered this style of pants in one size and size L and I feel like those were too tight in the seat for sure.  If you are curvy, I would also size up.  These also need to be hand washed in a sink or tub and not just the delicate cycle in your machine.  They will absolutely fall apart in a machine.  Most of the seams are finished, but the pocket seams are left as raw edges inside and may fray over time and detatch.

I love these boho pants. It is comfortable, pretty, and super soft! They will shrink a bit when you dry them in the dryer the first time, but the texture will become super soft.  The color and the style look exactly like the photographs. I love wearing them as room wear and going out in summer. They are light-weight but not see through.

I must admit when I saw the elastic shirring at the top of these pants I sort of laughed--BUT when I put them on, they felt great. I love rayon and these pants are that. I usually order a misses 10 but I ordered an XL so they would be baggy. They are perfect! I like the elastic at the ankles too. The only thing I don't like about them is that it is fall now and it's too cool to wear them....but I may put on a pair of leggings underneath and wear them anyway. Love the pants!
These are super cute harem pants. They are also very comfortable. Well made , they are made from a linen like material.  With a cinched waistband and at the ankles. Super comfortable.

Very comfortable pants. I have a 46 inch waist and I got an extra large and they fit comfortably. I even put my phone in a pocket and it didn't pull it down which is actually kind of amazing. They almost make it to my ankle. I wish they were longer, so they could actually be baggy. They match the shirt that I got off Amazon, so even though my daughters were embarrassed when I walked outside in my outfit, I like it. Its sweatpants comfort level but it looks like you tried a little harder to get yourself together.

Fits true to size, love the elephant print it's sophisticated and not childish looking. The design and style of the pants are very flattering and feminine, they are comfortable as well! Super cute and want to get more!

评论概述: So comfortable and the sizing and fit are great!
评论详情: These Tranquil Threads High-Waisted Boho Harem Yoga Pants are awesome. The fit is absolutely perfect. They are light, baggy, and comfortable. The length is perfect on me as well. For size reference, I am 5'7" tall, 166lbs, 26"waist, 30" hips. They aren't constricting at all, so they are great for yoga. They haven't shrunk or faded in the washer/dryer that I have noticed at all. I'm loving them! I'll be getting another color soon.

The fabric on these is silky and flows nicely on the figure. It's a rayon and looks and feels like silk. I do not like the fact that is hand wash only, but I can live with that. The waist is very elastic and does bind. It's actually a much nicer look than I thought it would be. I am pleasantly surprised.

These harem pants are fine. They are made from a thin material that does not stretch at all. I have other pants like these, and I found these particular pants much less flattering. I felt like the fabric bunching around the leg at the bottom billowed out and the pockets sat too far away from my body, making my hips look much wider.

评论概述: Order down at least one size
评论详情: Yes - they are supposed to be baggy, but I recommend ordering at least one size down. I am either L or XL depending.  Since these were made in Thailand, I assumed that they would run a but small. but that was not the case.  I wish I had ordered medium instead of large.I love the pattern and they are extremely comfortable.  Material is very soft but is very thin.  I tried them on with a window behind me and, when I put my hands in the pockets and pulled the pants sideways, I could see my legs and butt outlined.  Length does not come into play due to elastic at the bottom.  Waist is very comfortable with plenty of room to spare while still staying up.

Fabric is VERY airy, as in it’s thin as a hair on my head, so definitely not winter pants. They can be enjoyed in tropical places easily though because of how thin the fabric is, you definitely won't sweat at all.  I've been wearing Indian-made pants in this style for about a decade and they are basically my favorite shape/style of pants at this point. Very comfortable. The colors on these are great, ignore my phones terrible photo quality.

评论概述: No jokes about the comfort.  Easy on the skin, super flowy, and pretty too.
评论详情: Extremely comfortable pants that just slides right on.  The material is very flowy and breathable.  It has a beautiful pattern on it also.  I work as as server so my thighs get super chafed from all the running around so when I get home these things are the ABSOLUTE best and just feel perfect to wear.

评论概述: Perfect Blend of Comfort and Style - Boho Harem Yoga Pants
评论详情: I absolutely love these Boho Harem Yoga Pants! The smocked waist offers a comfortable and flexible fit, making them ideal for yoga, casual wear, and even festivals. The rayon fabric is incredibly soft, lightweight, and breathable, keeping me cool and comfortable all day long. Whether I'm lounging at home, running errands, or out for a casual night, these pants provide both comfort and style.  The variety of eye-catching prints, from bold florals to geometric patterns, allows me to express my unique style effortlessly. These pants are the perfect blend of fashion and comfort, and they’re now a staple in my wardrobe. I highly recommend them to anyone looking for versatile, stylish pants for any occasion!

Very lightweight harem pants with rich color/pattern and a super wide, "smocked-looking" waistband which hides troubled tummy areas well.  The fabric is incredibly lightweight making it a nice alternative to shorts in the summer.  I'm not a huge fan of the elastic ankles but that's more of a personal preference.  Overall, these are a nice pair of yoga/casual pants that I'll get a lot of use out of for yin classes and everyday wear.  Fit is true to the size chart and very forgiving due to the extremely elastic waist.  I'm happy with the purchase.

These Boho harem pants are very cute. The colors are bright and just as pictured. The cloth is a thin cloth and not stretchy, but it is definitely baggy so you don’t really need the stretch. The waistband is a nice thick waistband that stretches easily. I really like these pants, these will go great with a fitted T. They seem to be made well and do not have any funny odors. I really look forward to wearing these pants because they are super comfortable.

I ordered these pants in a size small, which is my usual size. I was a little nervous as I have put on a few pounds and was nervous they wouldn’t fit. Well! They fit nice.  Not only do they fit nicely, they look great too. The design is beautiful. The material is thin and light. I have a cruise coming up in May and they will be perfect for that.  The band across the waist is wide and high helping to hide love handles.  Overall, I am happy with these pants. I would recommend. 👍🏾
